name: Implied Correlation Dispersion
author: Daemon Alpha Lab
description: Captures correlation risk premium by trading the spread between implied correlation (from index options) and realized correlation (actual co-movements).

hypothesis.core: Implied correlation systematically differs from realized correlation, creating arbitrage opportunities
hypothesis.mechanism: Index options overestimate correlation during stress, underestimate during calm
hypothesis.edge: Sector ETF correlation proxy allows retail implementation of institutional dispersion trades

DISPERSION_LONG.description: Implied corr > realized corr - bet on decorrelation

DISPERSION_SHORT.description: Implied corr < realized corr - bet on correlation
DISPERSION_SHORT.expected_scenario: Macro factors dominate, stocks move together

academic_references: Driessen, Maenhout, Vilkov (2009) - The Price of Correlation Risk
Buss, Vilkov (2012) - Measuring Equity Risk with Option-Implied Correlations
